title: The ‘Succession’ Finale and a Farewell to the ‘Breaking Bad’ Universe | The Watch
description:
Andy calls in to talk about the finale of ‘Succession’ as well as the second season as a whole (0:40). Then they dive into ‘El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie’ and the continuation of the Jesse Pinkman story line (21:30). Finally, your number one boys dissect the 'Succession' finale (39:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Andy Greenwald

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
